alert.note: Alert for Allen; Jefferson Davis (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 9:59AM CST until January 30 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Kinder Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Kinder. * WHEN...Until Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding of wooded areas near the river will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Thursday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 16.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Calcasieu River Kinder 16.0 15.3 Thu 9 am CST 16.5 16.5 16.4 &&
